column_definition.name: column_definition
column_definition.description: Stores column/field definitions for all tables in the system

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: Column name in the database

columns.name: type
columns.description: Data type of the column (varchar, int, boolean, etc.)

columns.name: isGenerated
columns.description: Whether the value is auto-generated by the system

columns.name: isPrimary
columns.description: Whether this column is a primary key

columns.name: isNullable
columns.description: Whether NULL values are allowed

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined column

columns.name: defaultValue
columns.description: Default value for the column when inserting new records

columns.name: options
columns.description: Additional options like enum values, array items, or validation rules

columns.name: isUpdatable
columns.description: Whether the column can be updated after creation

columns.name: isHidden
columns.description: Whether to hide this column from API responses

columns.name: description
columns.description: Rich text description of the column's purpose

columns.name: placeholder
columns.description: Placeholder text for form inputs

relations.description: The table that this column belongs to

relation_definition.name: relation_definition
relation_definition.description: Defines relationships between tables (one-to-one, one-to-many, many-to-one, many-to-many)

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of relationship between tables

columns.name: propertyName
columns.description: Property name for accessing the relation in queries

columns.name: inversePropertyName
columns.description: Property name on the target table for bidirectional relations

columns.name: isNullable
columns.description: Whether the relation can be null

columns.name: onDelete
columns.description: Action to perform when referenced record is deleted

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined relation

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the relationship purpose

columns.name: junctionTableName
columns.description: Name of the junction table for many-to-many relations

columns.name: junctionSourceColumn
columns.description: Column name in junction table referencing source table

columns.name: junctionTargetColumn
columns.description: Column name in junction table referencing target table

relations.description: The table where this relation is defined
The table that this relation points to

table_definition.name: table_definition
table_definition.description: Stores metadata for all tables/collections in the database

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: Table name in the database

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system table

columns.name: isSingleRecord
columns.description: Whether this table should only have a single record (e.g., setting_definition)

columns.name: uniques
columns.description: Array of unique constraints (e.g., [['email'], ['name', 'parent']])

columns.name: indexes
columns.description: Array of database indexes for performance optimization

columns.name: alias
columns.description: Human-readable alias for the table

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the table's purpose

user_definition.name: user_definition
user_definition.description: Stores user accounts and authentication information

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique user identifier (UUID)

columns.name: email
columns.description: User's email address (unique login identifier)

columns.name: password
columns.description: Hashed password for authentication

columns.name: isRootAdmin
columns.description: Whether user has root admin privileges (cannot be changed)

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-generated user account

relations.description: User's assigned role for permissions

setting_definition.name: setting_definition
setting_definition.description: Stores global system configuration and settings

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: isInit
columns.description: Whether the system has been initialized

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether these are system settings

columns.name: projectName
columns.description: Name of the project/application

columns.name: projectDescription
columns.description: Description of the project/application

columns.name: projectFavicon
columns.description: Favicon URL or path for the project/application

route_definition.name: route_definition
route_definition.description: Defines API routes/endpoints for the application

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: path
columns.description: URL path for the route (e.g., /api/users)

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether the route is active and accessible

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined route

columns.name: icon
columns.description: Icon identifier for UI display

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of what the route does

relations.description: Additional tables that this route can access
Primary table that this route operates on

role_definition.name: role_definition
role_definition.description: Defines user roles for permission management

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: Unique role name (e.g., Admin, Editor, Viewer)

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the role's purpose and permissions

route_permission_definition.name: route_permission_definition
route_permission_definition.description: Maps permissions between roles, users, and routes

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether this permission rule is active

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of what this permission allows

relations.description: Role that this permission applies to
Route that this permission controls access to
Specific users who have this permission

route_handler_definition.name: route_handler_definition
route_handler_definition.description: Stores custom logic handlers for route endpoints

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: logic
columns.description: Custom JavaScript/TypeScript code to execute for this route

columns.name: timeout
columns.description: Timeout in milliseconds for route handler execution. If not set, uses default system timeout.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of what this handler does

relations.description: The route this handler is attached to
HTTP method (GET, POST, etc.) this handler responds to

hook_definition.name: hook_definition
hook_definition.description: Defines lifecycle hooks that run before/after route execution

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: Descriptive name for the hook

columns.name: preHook
columns.description: Code to execute before the main route handler

columns.name: afterHook
columns.description: Code to execute after the main route handler

columns.name: preHookTimeout
columns.description: Timeout in milliseconds for preHook execution. If not set, uses default system timeout.

columns.name: afterHookTimeout
columns.description: Timeout in milliseconds for afterHook execution. If not set, uses default system timeout.

columns.name: priority
columns.description: Execution order (lower numbers execute first)

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether the hook is active

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of what the hook does

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined hook

relations.description: Route this hook is attached to (null for global hooks)
HTTP methods this hook applies to

session_definition.name: session_definition
session_definition.description: Stores active user sessions and authentication tokens

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique session identifier

columns.name: expiredAt
columns.description: When the session expires

columns.name: remember
columns.description: Whether this is a long-lived 'remember me' session

relations.description: User who owns this session

schema_history.name: schema_history
schema_history.description: Tracks database schema changes and migrations

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: schema
columns.description: Full schema snapshot at this point in time

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of changes made in this version

columns.name: hash
columns.description: Hash of the schema for comparison and integrity checking

method_definition.name: method_definition
method_definition.description: Defines available HTTP methods (GET, POST, etc.) and GraphQL operations

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: method
columns.description: Method name (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE, GQL_QUERY, GQL_MUTATION)

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined method

relations.description: Permissions associated with this method
Routes that support this method

menu_definition.name: menu_definition
menu_definition.description: Defines the navigation menu structure for the application

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of menu item (Dropdown Menu can have children, Menu is a leaf node)

columns.name: label
columns.description: Display text for the menu item

columns.name: icon
columns.description: Icon identifier for the menu item

columns.name: path
columns.description: URL path the menu item links to

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether the menu item is visible

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined menu item

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the menu item's purpose

columns.name: order
columns.description: Display order within parent (lower numbers appear first)

columns.name: permission
columns.description: Permission rules controlling who can see this menu item

relations.description: Parent menu item (null for top-level items)

extension_definition.name: extension_definition
extension_definition.description: Stores custom UI extensions (pages and widgets) written in React/Vue

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of extension (full page or embeddable widget)

columns.name: name
columns.description: Human-readable name for the extension

columns.name: extensionId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the extension (auto-generated)

columns.name: version
columns.description: Version number of the extension

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether the extension is active

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined extension

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of what the extension does

columns.name: compiledCode
columns.description: Compiled/bundled JavaScript code ready for execution

columns.name: code
columns.description: Source code for the extension (React/Vue component)

relations.description: Menu item that links to this extension
User who created this extension
User who last updated this extension

folder_definition.name: folder_definition
folder_definition.description: Organizes files into a hierarchical folder structure

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique folder identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: Folder display name

columns.name: slug
columns.description: URL-friendly folder name (auto-generated from name)

columns.name: order
columns.description: Display order within parent folder

columns.name: icon
columns.description: Icon identifier for the folder

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the folder's purpose

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined folder

relations.description: Parent folder (null for root folders)
User who owns this folder

file_definition.name: file_definition
file_definition.description: Stores uploaded files and their metadata

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique file identifier

columns.name: filename
columns.description: Original filename including extension

columns.name: isPublished
columns.description: Allow public access without authentication

columns.name: mimetype
columns.description: MIME type of the file (e.g., image/png, application/pdf)

columns.name: filesize
columns.description: File size in bytes

columns.name: location
columns.description: Full path or URL to the file

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description or notes about the file

columns.name: status
columns.description: File status (active, archived, or quarantined)

relations.description: Folder containing this file
User who uploaded the file
Storage configuration (account) used for this file

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: actions
columns.description: Allowed actions for this permission

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Enable/disable this permission rule

columns.name: allowedDomains
columns.description: List of allowed domains for CORS (null = all domains)

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of what this permission allows

relations.description: File this permission applies to
Role that has this permission
Specific users who have this permission

package_definition.name: package_definition
package_definition.description: Manages npm packages installed in the application (frontend and backend)

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: NPM package name (e.g., lodash, express)

columns.name: version
columns.description: Actual installed version from node_modules

columns.name: flags
columns.description: Install flags like '--ignore-engines --force'

columns.name: type
columns.description: Whether this is a frontend (App) or backend package

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether the package is currently active

columns.name: description
columns.description: Short package description

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a core system package

relations.description: User who installed this package

bootstrap_script_definition.name: bootstrap_script_definition
bootstrap_script_definition.description: Stores custom scripts that run during application initialization

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: Unique name identifier for the bootstrap script

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of what the script does

columns.name: logic
columns.description: The actual script code to execute

columns.name: timeout
columns.description: Timeout in milliseconds for script execution. If not set, uses default system timeout.

columns.name: priority
columns.description: Execution priority order (lower numbers execute first)

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether the script is enabled for execution

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-generated script

relations.description: User who created the script
User who last updated the script

storage_config_definition.name: storage_config_definition
storage_config_definition.description: Configures storage backends for file uploads (local, S3, GCS, etc.)

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: name
columns.description: Storage configuration name (e.g., 'AWS S3', 'Google Cloud Storage', 'Local Storage')

columns.name: type
columns.description: Storage backend type

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether this storage configuration is active

columns.name: bucket
columns.description: Bucket name (used for S3/GCS)

columns.name: region
columns.description: Storage region - Required for S3 (e.g., us-east-1, ap-southeast-1), optional for R2 (use 'auto' or leave empty), not needed for GCS/Local Storage

columns.name: accessKeyId
columns.description: S3/R2 access key ID

columns.name: secretAccessKey
columns.description: S3/R2 secret access key

columns.name: accountId
columns.description: Cloudflare account ID (for R2, used to generate endpoint automatically)

columns.name: credentials
columns.description: GCS service account JSON credentials

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of this storage configuration

columns.name: isSystem
columns.description: Whether this is a system-defined storage configuration

relations.description: User who created this configuration
User who last updated this configuration

ai_conversation_definition.name: ai_conversation_definition
ai_conversation_definition.description: Stores AI agent conversation sessions. Each conversation contains multiple messages and can have a summary for long conversations.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: title
columns.description: Conversation title (auto-generated from first message)

columns.name: messageCount
columns.description: Cached count of messages in this conversation (user + assistant messages)

columns.name: summary
columns.description: Summary of old messages (created when conversation exceeds threshold)

columns.name: lastSummaryAt
columns.description: Timestamp when summary was last created or updated

columns.name: lastActivityAt
columns.description: Timestamp of the last activity in this conversation (updated when new messages are added)

columns.name: task
columns.description: Current active task for this conversation. Format: { type: string, status: 'pending'|'in_progress'|'completed'|'cancelled'|'failed', priority?: number, data?: any, result?: any, error?: string, createdAt?: Date, updatedAt?: Date }

relations.description: User who owns this conversation
AI configuration (provider, model) used for this conversation
Messages in this conversation

ai_message_definition.name: ai_message_definition
ai_message_definition.description: Stores individual messages in AI agent conversations. Includes user messages, assistant responses, and tool calls/results.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: role
columns.description: Message role: user (from user), assistant (from LLM), system (system prompts)

columns.name: content
columns.description: Message content. Null if assistant message has tool_calls (will have content in final response)

columns.name: toolCalls
columns.description: Tool calls made by LLM. Format: [{ id: 'call_abc123', type: 'function', function: { name: '...', arguments: '...' } }]

columns.name: toolResults
columns.description: Tool execution results. Format: [{ toolCallId: 'call_abc123', result: {...} }]. Must match tool_call_id with toolCalls.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: Message sequence number within conversation (incremental)

relations.description: Conversation this message belongs to

ai_config_definition.name: ai_config_definition
ai_config_definition.description: Stores AI agent configuration settings. Supports OpenAI-compatible (via baseUrl), Anthropic (Claude), Google (Gemini).

columns.name: id
columns.description: Primary key identifier

columns.name: provider
columns.description: AI provider (OpenAI-compatible via baseUrl, Anthropic, or Google)

columns.name: apiKey
columns.description: API key for the AI provider (sensitive, hidden from API responses)

columns.name: model
columns.description: Model name to use

columns.name: baseUrl
columns.description: Custom API base URL for providers that support overriding endpoint

columns.name: isEnabled
columns.description: Whether AI agent is enabled

columns.name: maxConversationMessages
columns.description: Maximum number of messages to include in LLM context (default: 10)

columns.name: llmTimeout
columns.description: LLM API timeout in milliseconds (default: 30000 - 30 seconds)

columns.name: maxToolIterations
columns.description: Maximum number of tool execution loops per LLM response (default: 10)

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the AI configuration
